idea-plugin.name: Cpplint Nova
idea-plugin.vendor: Brad Chamberlain (fork of Hu Dong's work)
idea-plugin.description:
Cpplint inspection for CLion that checks C/C++ code style compliance with Google's C++ Style Guide.

Features:

  • Real-time code style checking using cpplint
  • Inline warnings and error highlighting
  • Quick fixes for common violations (header guards, newlines, trailing whitespace, tab replacement, NOLINT suppression)
  • Suppress false positives with NOLINT comments
  • Auto-detect Python and cpplint installations
  • Configurable Python and cpplint paths with test button
  • Compatible with CLion Nova and CLion Classic

Requirements: Python and cpplint must be installed separately.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
Version 1.0.0 - Nova Edition

  • Modern IntelliJ Platform Gradle Plugin 2.x architecture
